attributes.action: Honour NIGEL FARAGE in recognition of services to the UK's EU withdrawal.
attributes.additional_details: A key figure in 'BREXIT:THE MOVIE'; involved in relentless debates on 'BREXIT', through all media, most notably with arch-EUphile SIR Nick Clegg in April 2014 ..... a landmark event and prelude on the EU-EXIT subject.
attributes.background: NIGEL FARAGE of UKIP was instrumental as a leading political figure in making the 2016 EU Rreferendum a reality and EU exit a reality. He did this by travelling around the UK and making informed presentations (based on vast MEP experience) to audiences on the numerous benefits of a UK EU withdrawal.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
